name: xpdom1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpan(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: Dominance law for Cartesian product. Theorem 6L(c) of [Enderton] p. 149. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.) (Revised by NM, 29-Mar-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2015.)
